_source.text: 1. Back Bacon is better than Borscht 2. The Beer is much better in Canada 3. 8 hour time difference means games played in prime time in Russia will be on at noon on East Coast and 9:00 AM on West Coast.

text: 1. Back Bacon **is** **better** **than** Borscht 2. The Beer is much better in **Canada** 3. 8 hour time difference means games played in prime time in Russia will be on at noon on East Coast and 9:00 AM on **West** **Coast**.

_source.text: About that, if you compare Vietnam or Thailand to Cambodia, i would say Vietnam and Thailand is better, why?

text: About that, if you compare Vietnam or **Thailand** to **Cambodia**, i would say Vietnam and **Thailand** **is** **better**, why?

_source.text: A few of the countries that do better than us in the world in infant deaths per thousand are:  Australia, Austria, Canada, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Japan, South Korea, New Zealand, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden Switzerland and the United Kingdom.

text: A few of the countries that do **better** **than** us in the world in infant deaths per thousand are
:  Australia, Austria, **Canada**, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Japan
, South Korea, New Zealand, Norway, Portugal, **Spain**, Sweden Switzerland and the United Kingdom.

_source.text: 1. Kamchatka Peninsula (If you want an Alaskan experience better than Alaska, then Kamchatka is pristine wilderness unmatched) 2. West Africa (esp Mali) 3. West Coast of South America (esp the Atacama Desert and the Galapagos Islands) 4. Oman and Yemen (Who has a Yemeni stamp in their passport?). 5. North Africa.

text: 1. Kamchatka Peninsula (If you want an Alaskan experience **better** **than** Alaska, then Kamchatka is
pristine wilderness unmatched) 2. West Africa (esp Mali) 3. **West** **Coast** of South America (esp the
Atacama Desert and the Galapagos Islands) 4. Oman and **Yemen** (Who has a Yemeni stamp in their passport?). 5. North Africa.
